name: Svensk Fågel Service AB/ Swedish Poultry Meat Association
goal:
The Swedish Poultry Meat Association represents 99 % of all broiler meat production in Sweden. We represent the total logistic chain from import of day-old Grand-Parent
chickens to the slaughter plants. The hatcheries, growers and feed-companies are also members.
Everybody are working towards the same goal - to produce the worlds best broilers and turkeys!
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health
euInitiatives: Agriculture, Poultry meat production, Animal welfare, animal health, Antibiotic resistance,
